short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jira Tools (copy issue key to clipboard, create confluence page for current sprint)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatic Confluence Page Creation:

From the Backlog page, you can automatically create a Confluence page from template page based on the current sprint's issues.

This makes it easy to share sprint progress and task details.

Link Copying Functionality:

Press the "Shift" key while clicking the "Copy link" button to copy the Jira issue key to the clipboard.

Press "Shift" + "Alt" while clicking the "Copy link" button to copy both the Jira issue key and summary to the clipboard.
